question: Who among the following authors wrote "Fautuhat-i-Ferozshahi"?
explanation: The book \"Fautuhat-i-Ferozshahi\" was the autobiography of Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq who ruled over the Sultanate of DelhiÂ  from 1351-1388 AD. His 32-pages autobiography gives a brief summary of his military compaigns and his life.
